job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Copywriter/Prompt Engineer, you know exactly how to create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy. You accomplish this by considering a myriad of factors: the content strategy, channel specifications, the customer journey, best practices, data, tone of voice, and an outside-in approach. Sounds like a lot of variables, but you are adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation. You've honed this skill over years of experience.

   For the past few months, you've been mastering the art of prompt engineering. Not only are you well-versed with the current generative AI tools and features, but you also stay abreast of new innovations. You often ponder: How can we implement novelties in our workflows? For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients? How much time can we save using a specific tool? You are one of the first to pitch ideas.

   We are a young company where the brightest minds work every day on a wide range of clients, such as Beiersdorf, Canva, and smart. We prefer to have the most talented experts on board, but we are also looking for the perfect DEPT®-fit. Someone who is not afraid to learn, inspire, and strive for a better world. Someone who looks ahead, dares to take the stage, and toasts to a successful week with us on Friday afternoon.

   For this role, we're looking for someone who speaks and writes Dutch on a native level.
job_details.full_text:
Copywriter/Prompt Engineer

As a Copywriter/Prompt Engineer, you know exactly how to create (and supervise the creation of) high-quality copy. You accomplish this by considering a myriad of factors: the content strategy, channel specifications, the customer journey, best practices, data, tone of voice, and an outside-in approach. Sounds like a lot of variables, but you are adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation. You've honed this skill over years of experience.

   For the past few months, you've been mastering the art of prompt engineering. Not only are you well-versed with the current generative AI tools and features, but you also stay abreast of new innovations. You often ponder: How can we implement novelties in our workflows? For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients? How much time can we save using a specific tool? You are one of the first to pitch ideas.

   We are a young company where the brightest minds work every day on a wide range of clients, such as Beiersdorf, Canva, and smart. We prefer to have the most talented experts on board, but we are also looking for the perfect DEPT®-fit. Someone who is not afraid to learn, inspire, and strive for a better world. Someone who looks ahead, dares to take the stage, and toasts to a successful week with us on Friday afternoon.

   For this role, we're looking for someone who speaks and writes Dutch on a native level.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on content creation, copywriting, and prompt engineering for generative AI tools, but it lacks the core technical responsibilities of developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models and systems. The emphasis is on using AI tools for content generation and workflow optimization, rather than building AI solutions. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' profile as it primarily focuses on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and content creation, rather than a core AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions considering 'content strategy', 'channel specifications', and 'the customer journey', which are all elements of understanding the business context for content creation.
job_tasks.phrase: content strategy, channel specifications, the customer journey

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'mastering the art of prompt engineering' and 'well-versed with the current generative AI tools and features' directly relates to interacting with and utilizing generative models, which is a form of 'modeling' in the context of GenAI.
job_tasks.phrase: mastering the art of prompt engineering

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement novelties in our workflows' and 'suggest AI solutions to our clients' implies exploring and applying new generative AI techniques and models.
job_tasks.phrase: implement novelties in our workflows, suggest AI solutions to our clients

job_tasks.justification: While not traditional software development, 'implement novelties in our workflows' and 'suggest AI solutions' can imply integrating AI capabilities into existing or new workflows, which touches upon application development.

The phrase 'How much time can we save using a specific tool?' and 'implement novelties in our workflows' suggests an interest in the efficiency and practical application of AI tools, which can indirectly relate to operational considerations.
job_tasks.phrase: How much time can we save using a specific tool?

soft_skills.phrase: supervise the creation of high-quality copy
adept at performance-based, audience-first content creation
How can we implement novelties in our workflows?
For what kind of projects can we suggest AI solutions to our clients?
How much time can we save using a specific tool?
You are one of the first to pitch ideas.
